basics.name: Bojana Bajzelj
basics.label: Carbon Removal Expert
basics.summary: Environmental scientist with PhD from University of Cambridge with 15 years of experience in sustainability and climate across academia, NGOs, the private sector and government.

work.name: Supercritical
work.summary: Responsible for the vetting of carbon removal methods and projects and helping businesses set their carbon removal strategies.

work.name: Supercritical
work.summary: Helped businesses measure, reduce and offset their emission with high-quality carbon removal offsets. Developed carbon footprinting, removals offset vetting, & thought-leadership on both emissions reductions and supporting and scaling carbon removal technologies.

work.name: Waste and Resource Action Programme (WRAP)
work.summary: Programme and strategy development, planning and delivery; International food sustainability focus.
